import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from './../Layout/Header1'; import Footer from './../Layout/Footer1'; import PageTitle from './../Layout/PageTitle'; import bnr from './../../images/banner/bnr3.jpg'; const iconBlog = [ {icon: , title:'Free shipping on orders $60+', para:'Order more than 60$ and you will get free shippining Worldwide. More info.', }, {icon: , title:'Worldwide delivery', para:'We deliver to the following countries: USA, Canada, Europe, Australia', }, {icon: , title:'60 days money back guranty!', para:'Not happy with our product, feel free to return it, we will refund 100% your money!', }, ]; class Login extends Component { render() { return ( <>
{/* */}

{/* */}

If you have an account with us, please log in.

FORGET PASSWORD ?

We will send you an email to reset your password.

Back

) } } function OrderDetail(){ return( <>

{data.title}

) } export {OrderDetail}; export default Login;
